THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Reinforcement: The thumbnail visually reinforces the title by showing a character about to ignore a clear warning sign ('DON'T EVEN TRY'). This directly ties to the video’s theme of testing boundaries or doing unexpected things in a game that developers did not anticipate.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: No major mismatch. Both thumbnail and title play on the idea of testing limits. Thumbnail visually dramatizes the 'trying' despite a warning, aligning well with the title’s promise of curiosity and experimentation.
